solution_line_template: A single layer of each wall requires {rows_per_wall} rows * {bricks_per_row} bricks per row = <<{rows_per_wall}*{bricks_per_row}={single_layer_bricks}>>{single_layer_bricks} bricks.

As each wall has a thickness of {wall_thickness} bricks, he will need {single_layer_bricks} bricks * {wall_thickness} = <<{single_layer_bricks}*{wall_thickness}={bricks_per_wall}>>{bricks_per_wall} bricks per wall.
If the complete fence contains four walls, he will require a total of {bricks_per_wall}*{num_walls}=<<{bricks_per_wall}*{num_walls}={total_bricks}>>{total_bricks} bricks.
